blockers.concern: Auth inconsistency: Task 1.1 preserves config-file auth but SDD mandates env-only (SKP-003 resolution)
blockers.rationale: Remove config-file auth from lib-curl-fallback.sh extraction. Env-only auth everywhere via lib-security.sh:ensure_codex_auth().

blockers.concern: Capability probe brittleness: detect_capabilities() relies on stderr parsing which varies across codex versions
blockers.rationale: Add version-pinned stderr expectations + integration test that validates probe against real codex binary.

blockers.concern: Redaction corruption risk: jq walk() may drop fields if pattern matches structural keys
blockers.rationale: Redact only string VALUES, never keys. Add post-redaction structural diff to verify no key loss.

blockers.concern: Tool-access workspace security: --cd repo-root with --tool-access exposes entire working tree including .env, .git/config
blockers.rationale: Pre-flight sandbox: copy only allowed files to temp workspace, run codex there. Deny list becomes allow list.
